section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the Courtâ€™s opinion and judgment to announce in number 72-922, Paschall against Christie-Stewart Incorporated.
For reasons stated in an opinion filed this morning, the judgment of the Supreme Court of Oklahoma is vacated and remanded for a further consideration.
Also, I have to state that Mr. Justice Douglas, with whom Mr. Justice Stewart joins, filed a dissenting opinion.
